name: Decline Pushups
how_to_perform:
1\. Start with your hands shoulder-width apart on a decline bench, grasping it firmly. Engage your core and maintain a straight line from head to heels.

2\. Slowly lower your body until your chest almost touches the surface you're pushing against. Lower yourself down by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body.

3\. Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement, ensuring that your body is still in a stable position and that your muscles feel engaged.

4\. Push back up to the starting position by straightening your arms, maintaining control throughout the exercise.

5\. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Decline pushups are a variant of traditional pushups that place greater emphasis on engaging the chest muscles. This variation is performed on an inclined or decline bench and targets multiple muscle groups simultaneously.
